questions.text: When studying for an exam, what do you prefer to do?

choices.text: Read textbooks and take detailed notes
Watch videos and listen to lectures

questions.text: How do you best remember information?
In a classroom, you learn best when:

choices.text: The teacher speaks clearly and uses examples
There are visual aids and demonstrations

results.name: Visual Learner
results.description: You learn best through reading, writing, and visual materials. You prefer charts, diagrams, and written instructions.

results.name: Auditory Learner
results.description: You learn best through listening and speaking. You prefer lectures, discussions, and verbal instructions.

results.name: Kinesthetic Learner
results.description: You learn best through hands-on experience and movement. You prefer practical exercises and real-world applications.

results.name: Social Learner
results.description: You learn best through interaction with others. You prefer group work, discussions, and collaborative activities.

questions.text: What type of projects interest you most?
How do you prefer to work?
What's most important to you in a programming language?

results.name: JavaScript/TypeScript
results.description: Perfect for web development! You'll love the flexibility and vast ecosystem. Great for both frontend and backend development.

results.name: Java/Kotlin
results.description: Excellent choice for enterprise and mobile development! Strong typing, great tooling, and cross-platform capabilities.

results.name: Python
results.description: Ideal for data science and rapid development! Simple syntax, powerful libraries, and great for AI/ML projects.

results.name: Rust/C++
results.description: Perfect for systems programming! You value performance, memory safety, and low-level control over your applications.

questions.text: What sounds most appealing for a vacation?

choices.text: Hiking in national parks and camping
Experiencing nightlife in a big city

questions.text: How do you prefer to travel?
What's your ideal vacation pace?

results.name: Adventure Seeker
results.description: You crave outdoor adventures and physical challenges! National parks, hiking trails, and wilderness camping are perfect for you.

results.name: Culture Enthusiast
results.description: You love learning about history and different cultures! Museums, historical sites, and cultural tours will fascinate you.

results.name: Relaxation Lover
results.description: You need peace and tranquility! Beach resorts, spas, and quiet retreats will help you recharge and unwind.

results.name: Urban Explorer
results.description: You thrive in the energy of big cities! Nightlife, restaurants, shopping, and metropolitan culture excite you.

questions.text: What motivates you most at work?
How do you prefer to work?
What work environment appeals to you?

results.name: Service Professional
results.description: You're drawn to careers that help others! Consider roles in consulting, healthcare, education, or customer service.

results.name: Creative Artist
results.description: You have an artistic soul! Explore careers in design, writing, music, film, or other creative industries.

results.name: Business Leader
results.description: You're a natural leader! Consider roles in management, entrepreneurship, finance, or business development.

results.name: Research Scientist
results.description: You love discovering new things! Pursue careers in research, academia, data science, or technical innovation.

questions.text: What's your greatest strength?
How do you handle conflict?

choices.text: Try to find a peaceful solution

questions.text: What's your ideal superpower?

results.name: Superman
results.description: You're a natural protector with incredible strength and unwavering moral compass. You inspire others and never back down from a challenge.

results.name: Batman
results.description: You're a strategic mastermind who uses intelligence and resources to solve problems. You're prepared for any situation.

results.name: The Flash
results.description: You're quick-thinking and action-oriented. You can adapt rapidly to changing situations and help others in the nick of time.

results.name: Wonder Woman
results.description: You combine strength with wisdom and compassion. You fight for justice while seeking to understand and heal conflicts.

name: What Type of Food Lover Are You?

questions.text: What's your ideal dining experience?

choices.text: Comfort food that reminds you of home

questions.text: How do you choose what to eat?

choices.text: I seek out unique and rare dishes

questions.text: What's most important in food?

results.name: Gourmet Explorer
results.description: You're a culinary adventurer who seeks out unique flavors and dining experiences. You appreciate artistry in food preparation.

results.name: Comfort Food Enthusiast
results.description: You find joy in familiar, hearty meals that bring back good memories. Food is about connection and emotional satisfaction.

results.name: Health-Conscious Foodie
results.description: You prioritize nutrition and sustainability. You believe good food should nourish both body and planet.

results.name: Practical Eater
results.description: You value convenience and efficiency in your meals. Food is fuel, and you prefer simple, satisfying options.

questions.text: How much time can you dedicate to a pet daily?

choices.text: Several hours for walks and play
About an hour for interaction and care
30 minutes for feeding and basic care
Just a few minutes for minimal care

questions.text: What type of living space do you have?
What do you want from a pet relationship?

results.name: Dog
results.description: A loyal, energetic companion perfect for your active lifestyle! Dogs offer unconditional love and are great exercise partners.

results.name: Cat
results.description: An affectionate yet independent companion! Cats provide comfort and companionship while being relatively low-maintenance.

results.name: Rabbit
results.description: A gentle, quiet companion perfect for smaller spaces! Rabbits are social animals that can be litter-trained and very affectionate.

results.name: Fish
results.description: Beautiful, peaceful pets that are perfect for busy lifestyles! An aquarium can be both relaxing and aesthetically pleasing.

questions.text: What activities energize you most?
How do you handle change?

choices.text: I love fresh starts and new opportunities

questions.text: What's your ideal social setting?

results.name: Summer
results.description: You're energetic, social, and love being active! You bring warmth and enthusiasm to everything you do.

results.name: Winter
results.description: You're thoughtful, introspective, and value deep connections. You appreciate quiet moments and cozy comforts.

results.name: Fall
results.description: You're wise, reflective, and appreciate life's transitions. You find beauty in change and maturity.

results.name: Spring
results.description: You're optimistic, creative, and always growing! You inspire others with your fresh perspective and energy.

questions.text: How do you prefer to share ideas?
In group discussions, you typically:

choices.text: Lead with facts and logical arguments
Keep energy high and motivate others
Listen carefully and ask thoughtful questions
Use gestures and visual aids to explain

questions.text: When giving feedback, you focus on:

results.name: Analytical Communicator
results.description: You communicate with precision and logic. You excel at presenting data-driven arguments and systematic thinking.

results.name: Inspirational Communicator
results.description: You energize and motivate others through passionate communication. You're great at rallying people around shared goals.

results.name: Empathetic Communicator
results.description: You connect deeply with others through active listening and understanding. You create safe spaces for honest dialogue.

results.name: Visual Communicator
results.description: You make complex ideas accessible through demonstrations and visual examples. You help others see what you mean.

questions.text: How do you plan your day?

choices.text: Detailed schedule with specific time blocks
General goals with room for spontaneity
Go with the flow and handle things as they come

questions.text: When facing a deadline, you:

choices.text: Break it into smaller tasks with mini-deadlines
Focus intensely on the most important parts
Work steadily but allow for creative breaks
Push through with bursts of energy

questions.text: Your ideal work environment has:

choices.text: Balance between work and personal time
Flexibility and variety in daily tasks

results.name: Structured Planner
results.description: You thrive with detailed organization and systematic approaches. You're reliable and rarely miss deadlines.

results.name: Focused Achiever
results.description: You excel at prioritizing and concentrating on what matters most. You're efficient and results-oriented.

results.name: Balanced Organizer
results.description: You maintain healthy boundaries between productivity and personal time. You're sustainable and well-rounded.

results.name: Flexible Adapter
results.description: You work best with variety and freedom. You're creative and can handle unexpected changes with ease.
